# 39th Annie Awards

| site = Royce HallLos Angeles, California, U.S.
| host = Patton Oswalt
| organizer = ASIFA-Hollywood
| best_film = Rango
| best_direction = Jennifer Yuh Nelson
| best_direction_film = Kung Fu Panda 2
| best_actor =

| most_nominations = Kung Fu Panda 2 (12)

The 39th Annual Annie Awards honoring the best in animation of 2011 were held on February 4, 2012, at Royce Hall in Los Angeles, California.}} Puss in Boots – DreamWorks Animation
* Michael Kahn The Adventures of Tintin: The Secret of the Unicorn– Amblin Entertainment, Wingnut Films and Kennedy/Marshall
* Stephen Schaffer, A.C.E. Cars 2'' – Pixar
Juried awards
;Winsor McCay Award: Walt Peregoy, Borge Ring, and Ronald Searle
;June Foray: Art Leonardi
;Special Achievement: Depth Analysis
